description:
My trading basics course on technical analysis is a no-frills introduction into the world of charts for everybody interested in trading & financial markets:You will get:
  • over 30 lectures with more than 30 minutes content
  • chart analysis demonstrated with examples
  • basic introduction into Elliot Wave Framework
  • scientific basis why people can recognize chart patterns
  • interactive game: picking real from fake charts (external link)
  • all this from a financial professional, CFA® charterholder with more than 16 years of market experience
title: Trading basics – technical analysis and charts
